parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup schedule.

> Specify either BackupPlanId or RestoreTaskId.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: EndTimestamp
parameters.description: The end time of the backup.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be an integer that is greater than or equal to 0. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

> The default value is 30.

parameters.name: RestoreTaskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the restore job. You can specify multiple IDs. Separate them with commas (,). You can call the [CreateRestoreTask](~~2869836~~) operation to obtain this parameter.

> Specify either RestoreTaskId or BackupPlanId. If you specify both, an error is returned.

parameters.name: StartTimestamp
parameters.description: The start time of the backup.
